solution_line_template: So he spends {weightlifting_minutes_per_day}+{warmup_minutes}=<<{weightlifting_minutes_per_day}+{warmup_minutes}={total_minutes_per_day}>>{total_minutes_per_day} minutes at the gym per day
That means he spends {total_minutes_per_day}*{gym_days_per_week}=<<{total_minutes_per_day}*{gym_days_per_week}={total_minutes_per_week}>>{total_minutes_per_week} minutes at the gym
So he spends {total_minutes_per_week}/{minutes_per_hour}=<<{total_minutes_per_week}/{minutes_per_hour}={total_hours_per_week}>>{total_hours_per_week} hours at the gym a week
